title: Learn all about Power BI Aggregations

value.title: The How and Why of Power BI Aggregations
value.excerpt: Learn the how and why Power BI Aggregations can help your data model be more efficient. This video is part of a Power BI Aggregations series.  Aggregations Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/desktop-aggregations  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************

value.title: Configure Power BI Aggregations

value.title: Are you HITTING your Power BI aggregations???
value.excerpt: Are you not sure if you are hitting your Power BI Aggregations? value.title: Using Precedence to force Power BI Aggregations
value.excerpt: Are your Power BI Aggregations not matching? Setting Precedence can control which Power BI aggregation will be preferred. A little hint to help it on its way!  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/desktop-aggregations#aggregation-precedence  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership
